mapper.insert: insert into administrator( admin_type, admin_id, admin_pw, admin_name, admin_contact, admin_address, admin_gender, admin_email, ent_name) values( #{admin_type}, #{admin_id}, #{admin_pw}, #{admin_name}, #{admin_contact}, #{admin_address}, #{admin_gender}, #{admin_email}, #{ent_name})
mapper.select: select count(*) from administrator where admin_name like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
select count(admin_id) from administrator where admin_id = #{admin_id}
select admin_pw from administrator where admin_id=#{admin_id}
